howToUse.title: How to Use The PS2 AI Filter

steps.title: Upload Your Artistic Content
steps.content: Start by uploading your photos, sketches, or digital art pieces in formats like JPG, PNG, or WEBP. The PS2 AI Filter analyzes and prepares your visuals for optimal enhancement.

steps.title: Select the PS Game Style
steps.content: Choose from an extensive range of game styles including retro game, Minecraft, The Legend of Zelda, and more.

steps.title: Click 'Convert to PS Game'
steps.content: Harness the power of AI to transform your original content, applying intricate filters and enhancements. Observe previews and fine-tune adjustments to reach your desired artistic output.

steps.title: Download and Share Your Masterpieces
steps.content: Save high-resolution versions of your enhanced images for printing, digital distribution, or social media. Effortlessly manage your content with integrated asset tools for sharing.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

faq.q2: How to use the PS2 AI Filter?
